attributes.title: whoever designed this app should be fired
attributes.review:
this app is terrible! for one, it’s the official app of the angry cheeto man 🤮, and that’s worrying enough on its own! they could spread fake news, they already have, and they keep on doing it! another thing, the layout is absolutely atrocious! when you first open it, you see an incompetent  idiot, which is simply a bad design idea, i mean, no one wants to see that, and the colors are off putting, it’s terribly designed. i urge apple to take this off the app store, it brings the entire company down into hell with it. 

the following message is for trump and trump only:
we all make mistakes🧚‍♂️💕🌼your mom just made the biggest one🌈✨🧚‍♂️

attributes.title: 0/10 never again
attributes.review: After getting this app my dog randomly disappeared😡 the orange man who showed me his pp as the first thing then took my dog and said if i dont give him an orange enough spray tan then my dog is gone😔it was so terrible it caused me and my dog trauma that we suffer with every single day😤😿 we go to therapy so much that the therapist refuses to see us and makes us go somewhere else😡😡 never getting this app again

attributes.title: Bad, scarred my children for life👁👅👁
attributes.review: I’m a mother of 10, and we love trump so much, but this app is just horrendous. We opened the app with good intentions only to see disturbing imagery of trump’s sextape with Kanye West. MY CHILDREN DO NOT NEED TO SEE PEOPLE HAVING SEX ON AN APP OF THE GREATEST MAN ON EARTH!!!!😡🤬🤬🤬🤬 Even worst of all, the time my child opened the app, she saw trumps naked body just standing in the shape of the letter T. This is absolutely disgusting and I hope you people learn your lesson and take this down.👁👄👁

attributes.title: It’s a bad App
attributes.review: I downloaded this app think I was going to see some drama on here but i guess not. But anyways I bought this really cute case for my phone yesterday it has spongebob and Patrick on it. It’s really cute then I took a big nap and I woke up then I decided hey why not download this app to see the rally as well but it was just boring so then I deleted it and watched Netflix instead because why the heck not.

attributes.title: Terrible app run by a Cheeto
attributes.review: This app makes me want to throw up because of this terrible person. Right after I downloaded it I deleted it 2 seconds later because I opened it up and the first thing I saw was a man that had a horrible spray tan and fake looking hair, it almost looked like he was a living Cheeto. I would not recommend this app to anyone, if I could give it 0 stars I would!

attributes.title: A. Big. Fat. No. 🤬
attributes.review: Immediately when I opened the app my apartment filled with rats🤯🙀. And when I went to text my mother, I noticed that my home screen was a giant Cheeto man on a tread mill🤮🤮 👿. And then  all the fruit in my house was replaced with oranges.🧚🏽‍♀️✨✨✨🧚🏼‍♂️ I sadly had to delete after my sleep paralysis demon sat me down and told me the app turned off it’s WiFi.👁👄👁 Hate to delete, but it must be done. Hate to see it. BLM!!✨💖🧚🏼‍♂️💋💅🏽✨✨👁👅👁🧚🏼‍♂️☠️😍

attributes.title: Almost died
attributes.review: The photo that popped up literally gave me a seizure. I went to the hospital and came back to life because i couldn't believe what i just witnessed. May whoever made this cruel app reconsider their life decisions and wonder why they would ever put someone through this. Hopefully this app gets taken off the app store and i will be suing for trauma. Also now anytime i see orange cheetos at the store i have a stroke.

attributes.title: Gross!
attributes.review: If I could give negative stars, this app would Definitely earn negative 1000! First of all, I don’t like seeing Cheetos cuz it just makes me more hungry than I already am. SECOND OFF, I feel like having my little brother (who is 12) in office would be better than having Trump in office. And third, Trump is a horrible person and has had no political background before being president!

attributes.title: Disgusted
attributes.review:
I was going to get some stuff for my child
When I saw a disgusted Image pop up useless this app has costed my child Night terrors and ptsd unforgivable and he has to take medication to sleep he was recently released to me on July 1 and i’m afraid he has to go back to the mental hospital disgusted this app ended up charging me 34$ to remove the pop up evil I say I will never  download this app and never vote for him 👎

attributes.title: Eww
attributes.review: So when I opened the app it didn’t open so I kept trying and trying and it took 12 freakin decades to open somehow so that left me confused but it don’t matter and when I opened it I saw Cheeto eating carrot... GROSS!!!🤮✋ and I went further and saw carrot eating Cheeto... GROSS!!!🤢✋🤮 and then my mom killed me and now I’m dead can someone give me feedback on how I use this oh wait my shsjaonden  dsjisnsndb njdjsnsntnrkzjbdndkamdnrndksknzbdndndksn sis did dibs
